findings.title: Poorly configured parameters can lead to overflows
findings.description: It is possible to overflow limits calculation if maximum_deposit_amount and maximum_deposit_total are configured with an extremely high value.

findings.title: Upgrade code to Solidity version > 0.5.3
findings.description: The contracts are written in a vulnerable version of Solidity (0.5.3) and it is recommended to upgrade to a higher version.
